entries.name: document
entries.desc: Documentation types.  For use by the Gem.done_installing hook

entries.name: errors
entries.desc: Errors from SpecFetcher while searching for remote specifications

entries.name: installed_gems
entries.desc: List of gems installed by install in alphabetic order

entries.name: consider_local?()
entries.desc: Indicated, based on the requested domain, if local gems should be considered.

entries.name: consider_remote?()
entries.desc: Indicated, based on the requested domain, if remote gems should be considered.

entries.name: find_spec_by_name_and_version(gem_name, version = Gem::Requirement.default, prerelease = false)
entries.desc: Finds a spec and the source_uri it came from for gem gem_name and version.  Returns an Array of specs and sources required for installation of the gem.

entries.name: install(dep_or_name, version = Gem::Requirement.default)
entries.desc: Installs the gem dep_or_name and all its dependencies.  Returns an Array of installed gem specifications.
